content.rendered:
Maple Avenue Middle School would like to celebrate all student musicians for their performances during the December concerts.

Below you will find the performances that were recorded during school hours for all Chorus grade levels, the 6th grade Orchestra, and the 6th grade Band.

  • Chorus – Grade 6
  • Chorus – Grade 7
  • Chorus – Grade 8
  • Orchestra – Grade 6 – B Day
  • Orchestra – Grade 6 – D Day
  • Band – Grade 6 – B Day
  • Band – Grade 6 – D Day
